resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103586</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103586</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206426</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">CivilWar@ Smithsonian</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">CivilWar @ Smithsonian</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">CivilWar @ Smithsonien</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">CivilWar @ Smithsonian</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">CivilWar @ Smithsonian</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">CivilWar@ σμιθσονιτικός</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">CivilWar @ Smithsonian</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">examines the Civil War through collections of artifacts. Topics include slavery and abolition, Abraham Lincoln, the first Union officer killed, soldiering, weapons, leaders, cavalries, navies, life and culture, Appomattox, Winslow Homer, and Mathematics and Statisticsew Brady. A Civil War timeline is included.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">überprüft den Bürgerkrieg durch Ansammlungen 
Kunstprodukte. Themen schließen Sklaverei und Aufhebung, 
Abraham Lincoln ein, der erste beendete Anschlußoffizier, Soldiering,
Waffen, Führer, Kavallerien, navies, Leben und Kultur, Appomattox, 
Winslow Homer und Mathematik und Statisticsew Brady. Ein 
Bürgerkrieg timeline ist enthalten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">examine la guerre civile par des collections 
d'objets façonnés. Les sujets incluent l'esclavage et 
l'abolition, l'Abraham Lincoln, le premier dirigeant syndical 
détruit, soldiering, armes, amorces, cavaleries, navies, vie et 
culture, Appomattox, Winslow Homer, et mathématiques et Statisticsew 
Brady. Une chronologie de guerre civile est incluse.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">examina a guerra civil através das coleções dos
artifacts. Os tópicos incluem o slavery e o abolition, o 
Abraham Lincoln, o primeiro oficial de união matado, soldiering, 
armas, líderes, cavalarias, navies, vida e cultura, Appomattox, 
Winslow Homer, e matemática e Statisticsew Brady. Um timeline 
da guerra civil é incluído.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">esamina la guerra civile attraverso le collezioni 
di manufatti. I soggetti includono lo slavery e l'abolizione, 
Abraham Lincoln, il primo ufficiale del sindacato ucciso, soldiering, 
armi, capi, cavalries, navies, vita e coltura, Appomattox, 
Winslow Homer e la matematica e Statisticsew Brady. Un timeline 
di guerra civile è incluso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εξετάζει τον εμφύλιο πόλεμο μέσω των συλλογών των 
χειροποίητων αντικειμένων. Τα θέματα περιλαμβάνουν τη 
σκλαβιά και την κατάργηση, τον Abraham Λίνκολν, τον πρώτο 
ανώτερο υπάλληλο ένωσης που σκοτώνονται, τα όπλα, τους ηγέτες, 
τα ιππικά, τα ναυτικά, τη ζωή και τον πολιτισμό, Appomattox, 
Winslow Όμηρος, και τα μαθηματικά και Statisticsew Brady. 
Μια υπόδειξη ως προς το χρόνο εμφύλιου πολέμου 
συμπεριλαμβάνεται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">examina la guerra civil a través de colecciones 
de artefactos. Los asuntos incluyen esclavitud y abolición, 
Abraham Lincoln, el primer oficial de unión matado, el soldiering, 
las armas, los arranques de cinta, las caballerías, las marinas de guerra, 
vida y cultura, Appomattox, Winslow Homer, y las matemáticas y 
Statisticsew Brady. Un timeline de la guerra civil es incluido.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206426</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103586</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/civilwar-smithsonian</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
